70135.「…………胸騒ぎが やまぬ。\n 闇が この美しい空を覆う日も\n 近いのかもし:
...The uneasiness won't stop. The day may soon come when darkness will cover this beautiful sky.
Traveler, do you see a similiar fate for Gran Zedora with your eyes?

70125.「ホ…ホントは 今すぐ逃げてえぜ。\n だけど 俺だって グランゼドーラの兵士だ:
Truth is, right now, I want to escape.
But afterall, I'm a soldier of Gran Zedora!
I'll guard this door at least!

70129.「外は 危険です。\n 城下町でも 戦いが始まっておりますので\n 城の中へ 避:
It's dangerous outside. In castletown, battles are breaking out. Take refuge in the castle!
We'll protect you all with our lives!

70130.「馬たちが おびえとるんだ。\n 風に乗って 戦場から\n 血のにおいが ただよ:
Horses are frightened. There's the smell of blood in the air coming from the battlefield...
A soldier told me to go to the castle, but I can't just leave the horses like this.
